metadata.name: Lover Of Picasso
metadata.description:
Dora Maar was an enigmatic figure in the life of the great artist, Pablo Picasso. She was his muse, his confidante, and his lover, but she was also a woman of great depth and complexity. The story of Dora Maar is one that is steeped in mystery and intrigue, and it is a tale that has fascinated art lovers for decades.

I tried to capture the essence of Dora Maar, the woman who inspired Picasso and who was herself a talented artist. It is a tribute to her beauty, her strength, and her enduring legacy in the world of art. With its abstract design and rich colors, this NFT invites viewers to explore the depth and complexity of Dora from the perspective of Picasso.
